players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I will not say anything today."
Charlie: "Charlie, the detective, will investigate Alice next to gather more information."
Diana: "Bob was a good guy, he didn't deserve to die. I'm the mafioso."

Diana: "Bob was a good guy, he didn't deserve to die. I'm the mafioso."
